attributes.action: tell the great British people exactly how the Lisbon treaty will affect us
attributes.background: Those who voted remain are trying to stop brexit from happening, if they do this the Lisbon treaty will come into effect here and many people don’t realise how bad the Lisbon treaty will be for them. Government should start being open and honest about it so people know exactly what is going on

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Lisbon Treaty came into force in the UK in December 2009, so we're not sure what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

There are already petitions about Brexit. You are more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/224908

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/226071
